transcript:
four crystal glasses engraved with the count's monogram that stood before his plate, Pierre held out one at random and drank with en joyment, gazing with ever-increas- ing amiability at the other guests. Natsha,who sat opposite, was looking at Borfs as girls of thirteen look at the boy they are in love with and have just kissed for the first time. Some- times that same look fell on Pierre, and that funny lively little girl's look made him inclined to laugh without knowing why. 
Nicholas
